name: "Superman and Batman: Generations" : 1 Quiz | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.text: The first story takes place in 1939. Where does Bruce Wayne land his airplane?
questions.correct: In the middle of the World's Fair.
questions.explanation:
In the middle of the World's Fair.

	Upon landing, Bruce tries to bribe the police out of arresting him, but is interrupted by a huge rampaging robot! Bruce Wayne may seem like he hasn't a care in the world, but he is really Batman, the Dark Knight!

questions.text: Lex Luthor is piloting the huge robot that menaces Metropolis.
questions.explanation:
False.

	It's implied that Luthor is a henchman of the Ultra-Humanite, the pilot of the robot. Ultra-Humanite has fought many superheroes in many different bodies over the years.

questions.text: It's 1949. Who has kidnapped Lois Lane?
questions.explanation:
The Joker.

	Lex Luthor and the Joker have teamed up to take down both of their rivals, Superman and Batman! Although the day is saved, Lois' unborn child is exposed to gold Kryptonite, which makes her super-offspring lose all superpowers.

questions.text: It's 1959, and Bat-Mite and Mr. Mxyzptlk have entered both heroes in a contest to see which is the better hero! Who won the contest?
questions.explanation:
Both Bat-Mite and Mr. Mxyzptlk

	A group of enslaved aliens decided to take one superhero back to their planet to help them fight for freedom. In the end, the aliens are more impressed by the powers of Bat-Mite and Mr. Mxyzptlk than of the heroes themselves!

questions.text: Superman has two children in 1959, both boys.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Superman has a son with no superpowers, Joel, and a daughter with superpowers, Kara. Kara later becomes a superhero on her own, and Joel is left bitter and jealous.

questions.text: In 1959, who is training to become Robin?
questions.explanation:
Bruce Wayne, Jr.

	By 1959 Dick Grayson was working as a lawyer, and Bruce Wayne's son was looking forward to becoming Robin. By 1969, Dick is Batman and Bruce is his Robin.

questions.text: It's 1969. Bruce Wayne is seen sitting at the grave of which character?
questions.explanation:
Alfred Pennyworth.

	On the tombstone, it is revealed that Alfred passed away in 1967, having been born in 1889. Alfred appears as a ghost to Bruce, giving his counsel from beyond the grave.

questions.text: It's 1979. Who is Superman's daughter marrying?
questions.explanation:
Bruce Wayne, Jr.

	Superman and Batman are on the verge of becoming related when Lex Luthor and Joel Kent crash the party. Luthor snaps Lois' neck and Joel kills his own sister in a jealous rage.

Lex Luthor.

	Driven to the point of madness by seeing his family and friends killed by Luthor and his cronies, Superman acts in self-defense and kills Lex Luthor. He can't be sure if his grief influenced his decision, so Superman exiles himself to the Phantom Zone for ten years.

questions.text: It's 2919, with which other superpowered being do Superman and Batman team up with?
questions.explanation:
Lana Lang.

	Lana took to dabbling in magic, and somehow made herself immortal. Due to a dip in the Lazarus Pit, Batman ages one year for every century and Superman is doing well enough on his own.
